meanings.definition: The study of ancient texts written on papyrus.
meanings.sent1: In papyrology, scholars examine old writings on papyrus to learn about the past.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in papyrology often analyze ancient documents written on papyrus scrolls.
meanings.sent3: The papyrology class had so many scrolls to study, it felt like they were lost in a sea of history.
meanings.sent4: To a papyrologist, each papyrus holds secrets waiting to be unlocked.
meanings.sent5: The papyrology professor made the study of ancient texts on papyrus come alive with vivid stories.

meanings.definition: The field of research focused on deciphering and interpreting ancient documents found on papyrus.
meanings.sent1: Papyrology involves carefully decoding and understanding ancient writings on papyrus.
meanings.sent2: In museums, experts in papyrology work to reveal the meanings behind old papyrus texts.
meanings.sent3: The papyrology team felt like detectives solving mysteries hidden in the papyrus scrolls.
meanings.sent4: In the world of papyrology, each document is a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of papyrology lies in unraveling the stories written on fragile papyrus sheets.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of ancient manuscripts written on papyrus.
meanings.sent1: Through papyrology, researchers analyze ancient manuscripts written on papyrus for insights.
meanings.sent2: The papyrology lab is filled with tools to examine the delicate papyrus manuscripts.
meanings.sent3: The papyrology conference was like a gathering of time travelers exploring ancient papyrus texts.
meanings.sent4: In the hands of a papyrologist, a simple papyrus sheet becomes a window to the past.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of papyrology lies in the meticulous study of ancient writings on fragile papyrus.
